title: Welcome to the Hotel
description: Charlie greets you at the Hazbin Hotel's entrance with her signature enthusiasm. 'Welcome! We're so glad you're here! Redemption starts today!'

choices.text: Match her energy! This is a fresh start!

outcomes.narrativeText: Charlie beams at your enthusiasm. 'I KNEW you were perfect for this! Let me show you around!'

choices.text: Redemption? In Hell? You're kidding, right?

outcomes.narrativeText: Vaggie smirks. 'At least you're realistic.' Charlie's smile doesn't waver. 'You'll see! Just give it a chance!'

choices.text: Thank you for having me. I'll do my best.

outcomes.narrativeText: A measured response earns nods from both Charlie and Vaggie. A good start.

title: The Promissory Pact
description: A demon with clockwork teeth approaches in a dark alley. 'I can give you POWER beyond imagination... for a small price. Just sign here.'

choices.text: Sign the contract. You need power NOW.

outcomes.narrativeText: Dark energy surges through you as the contract burns into your very soul. You feel POWERFUL... but at what cost?

choices.text: Try to negotiate better terms. (Control Check)

outcomes.narrativeText: Your sharp negotiation reduces the corruption cost. The demon grumbles but accepts. Smart.

choices.text: Walk away. Nothing is worth your soul.

outcomes.narrativeText: You turn your back on the offer. The demon hisses in frustration and vanishes. You kept your integrity.

title: The Radio Demon Arrives
description: Static fills the air. Alastor materializes with his ever-present grin. 'Greetings! Quite the pleasure to make your acquaintance!'

choices.text: Show proper respect to the Radio Demon.

outcomes.narrativeText: Alastor's grin widens. 'Ah, manners! How delightfully rare these days!'
His eyes flash with genuine interest. 'Oh my! Someone with SPINE! How entertaining!'

choices.text: Just nod and try to leave.

outcomes.narrativeText: How... disappointing. He vanishes in a crackle of static, clearly unimpressed.

title: Turf War: Small Claims
description: A weak demon controls a small territory. They're vulnerable. You could take it... but should you?

outcomes.narrativeText: The weak demon flees. The territory is yours. Other demons take notice.
They agree to pay tribute in exchange for protection. Smart business.
Not every battle needs fighting. You move on.

title: Join Charlie's Song
description: Charlie is rehearsing a new song about redemption. She invites you to join! Music fills the Hotel with hope.

outcomes.narrativeText: Your voices blend beautifully. Charlie's eyes light up. 'That was AMAZING! You really do believe!'
You appreciate the show from the sidelines. Charlie smiles warmly at you.

choices.text: Too sappy. Make an excuse and leave.

outcomes.narrativeText: Charlie's smile falters slightly as you slip away.
